text: Karol Drzewiecki and Filip Polášek were the defending champions but only Drzewiecki chose to defend his title, partnering Maciej Smoła. Drzewiecki lost in the first round to Matwé Middelkoop and Hans Podlipnik Castillo. Guido Andreozzi and Andrés Molteni won the title after defeating Middelkoop and Podlipnik Castillo 6–4, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==References== * Main Draw Pekao Szczecin Open - Doubles 2019 Doubles
title: 2019 Pekao Szczecin Open – Doubles
